title: Angelo State Online
description: Earn your degree online with ASU’s top-ranked online degree programs. Choose from a wide range of undergraduate, master’s, and doctoral programs.

headings: Blue and Gold Would Look Good On You!
paragraphs: Earn your degree wherever you are.
Whether you are looking to advance in your career, change careers or expand your general skill set, Angelo State Online has you covered.
Undergraduate Programs
Master’s Degree Programs
Doctoral Programs
Certificates and Certifications
Several of our online degree programs are nationally ranked by leading higher education resource guides. We want you to be career-ready when you graduate!
With our affordable tuition and ample scholarship opportunities, you can earn your online degree with minimal or no debt.
Our online format allows you to complete your coursework at your own pace. We offer several degrees and certificates that can be completed in less than one year!
We’re committed to keeping your academic goals within reach. Choosing Angelo State for your education will be one of the best investments you will ever make.
Tuition Estimator

The Ram Family is more than a saying at Angelo State - it’s a culture. We take care of our own, and stop at nothing to make sure you succeed.

“The professors and staff know me by name and believe in me; something I wouldn’t get at another university.”

Emily Richardson, Class of 2026

“The faculty at ASU knew my worth before I saw it in myself. They helped pave a way for me.”

Thalia Hernandez, Class of 2020

“The English faculty at ASU are both brilliant and down to earth. The graduate classes are rigorous, but the professors make the material engaging and accessible.”

Lydia Nixon, Class of 2020, English M.A. Program

“I chose ASU because the professors want to see you succeed and are willing to help you no matter what!”

Catherine Guerra, Class of 2022

“My favorite ASU memory is being able to connect with others going through the same program with me via online meetings and text! I have created friendships with people all over Texas.”

Ashley DeLuna Corbett, Master of Science in Professional School Counseling, Class of 2022

“Angelo State University offered a rigorous curriculum that I felt would prepare me well for my future career path.”

Caleb Vosburg, Physician, Class of 1998 and 2001

“During my two years of classes with Dr. Randolph Hicks, he probably received 50+ emails from me asking for help in my online classes. Not once did he ever complain. He made sure I understood and was successful in every class.” 

Catherine Guerra, Border and Homeland Security, Class of 2022

“The professors are extremely focused on helping you succeed in the professional world. I have used multiple tools I learned in MBA courses in my day-to-day profession.”

Katherine Springer, Class of 2021, Master of Business Administration Program

“I chose ASU because no other university local to me could provide this type of program.”

Julia Collins, B.A.A.S. with Adult Education Specialization

“It is great to be a part of a family with fellow students who actually care about you all over the world.”

John Delk, Class of 1996

“I chose ASU because they make it easier to be a single mother working a full-time job.”

Ashley DeLuna Corbett, Class of 2022

“I had no idea what I was getting myself into when I began my master’s degree at ASU, but the classes and the professors equipped me for even greater challenges.”

Lydia Nixon, English M.A. Program

“Angelo State is a great school for any program that you are going into. Be prepared for the grind, but it will all pay off in the end.”

Dominique Henry, Classes of 2019 and 2020, Management

“I recommend ASU to parents of students who are looking at universities and co-workers who are considering going back to school. It is affordable, and programs can be tailored to fit one’s needs.”

Tracie Watkins, ASU Alumna, CEO, Shannon Rehabilitation Hospital, San Angelo

“Through the help of the Angelo State staff and faculty, I landed in a field that I never knew I would love. ASU’s faculty and staff got me to where I am today.”

Brit Raley, Class of 2019
